subject: [Royal Rehab] Your Site is Experiencing a Technical Issue
preview: G'day!  Since WordPress 5.2 there is a built-in feature that detects when a plugin or theme causes a fatal error on your site, and notifies you with this automated email.  In this case, WordPress caug

full_threads.body:
G'day!

Since WordPress 5.2 there is a built-in feature that detects when a plugin or theme causes a fatal error on your site, and notifies you with this automated email.

In this case, WordPress caught an error with one of your plugins, WPJobBoard.

First, visit your website (https://royalrehab.com.au/) and check for any visible issues. Next, visit the page where the error was caught (https://royalrehab.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=wpjb-resumes&query=pujajs%40gmail.com) and check for any visible issues.

Please contact your host for assistance with investigating this issue further.

If your site appears broken and you can't access your dashboard normally, WordPress now has a special "recovery mode". This lets you safely login to your dashboard and investigate further.

https://royalrehab.com.au/wp-login.php?action=enter_recovery_mode&rm_token=WDZDMQyp7HyaGgDdHbUA5m&rm_key=5oZwcDEFs7Ph9B6zoZmfYM

To keep your site safe, this link will expire in 1 day. Don't worry about that, though: a new link will be emailed to you if the error occurs again after it expires.

When seeking help with this issue, you may be asked for some of the following information:
WordPress version 5.9.3
Current theme: Royal Rehab (version 1.0.0)
Current plugin: WPJobBoard (version 5.8.3)
PHP version 7.4.25



Error Details
=============
An error of type E_ERROR was caused in line 398 of the file /www/royalrehab2020_522/public/wp-content/plugins/wpjobboard/framework/Db/Query.php. Error message: Uncaught Daq_Db_Exception: syntax error, unexpected '@', expecting $end occured in query: SELECT COUNT(*) as `cnt` FROM `wp_wpjb_resume` AS `t1` INNER JOIN `wp_wpjb_resume_search` AS `t2` ON `t1`.`id`=`t2`.`resume_id` WHERE MATCH(t2.details) AGAINST ('+pujajs@gmail.com' IN BOOLEAN MODE) ORDER BY t1.featured_level, t1.modified_at DESC, t1.id DESC in /www/royalrehab2020_522/public/wp-content/plugins/wpjobboard/framework/Db/Query.php:398
Stack trace:
#0 /www/royalrehab2020_522/public/wp-content/plugins/wpjobboard/application/libraries/Model/ResumeSearch.php(83): Daq_Db_Query->fetchColumn()
#1 /www/royalrehab2020_522/public/wp-content/plugins/wpjobboard/application/libraries/Model/ResumeSearch.php(314): Wpjb_Model_ResumeSearch::_found(Object(Daq_Db_Query), false)
#2 /www/royalrehab2020_522/public/wp-content/plugins/wpjobboard/application/libraries/Module/Admin/Resumes.php(53): Wpjb_Model_ResumeSearch::search(Array)
#3 /www/royalrehab2020_522/public/wp-content/plugins/wpjobboard/application/librarie
